guidelinesBlock: Use compassionate, plain-English writing. Keep paragraphs short. Include at least one call to action above the fold. Avoid legal jargon unless explained.

firmDetails.attorneyBios: Lead attorney has focused on family law for over 12 years with extensive custody mediation experience.
firmDetails.differentiators: Client-first communication cadence, practical strategy memos after consultations, and multilingual intake support.
